author: Greg Fiess
comment: Had to download this version because I was locked out and could not log on to the app, even though I could online.  First two attempts the GPS located me, but didn't measure the distance! If revenue is so important, why can't previous versions be offered for a price?

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Hi Greg,

Thanks for your feedback.

Please get in touch with our support team via this form: http://undrarmr.co/2dFpRbo so we can try to help you out.

Cheers,
James

author: Chris Hodgkins
comment: This is a down grade. It tells me I have 10 miles left on a 6 mile plan. It also doesnt show remaining miles like the last version so I cant see if I have 0.2 miles left, it just says 0. Shocking upgrade. Can I have the old version back please.  Might try strava.

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Please contact our support team directly and we'll look into the issue and any possible troubleshooting options: http://undrarmr.co/2dFpRbo

Cheers, 
Brian

author: Antony Lees
comment: Love this app for running, cycling etc and is especially good for interval training. The pep talks are really fun with a group and I've used the app for years. Shame that it no longer works with Pebble, but I can see why people would end support

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Hi Antony, the interval feature has not been removed or made Premium only. The feature is missing because of a bug and we're working on getting it fixed. Please contact our support team directly and we will assist you further: http://undrarmr.co/2dFpRbo

Cheers,
Brian

author: Steve Keyes
comment: I have been paid user for five years. The new UI is huge disappointment. The old UI was much better, good enough for me to pay throughout the give years. Now, I won't be renewing my subscription.

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content: Hi Steve, this should be because you might have had Jabra connected on your phone in the past, please make sure that the Jabra App has been completely disconnected from your phone. If that is not the case, please submit a request on the following link: https://support.endomondo.com/hc/en-us/requests/new, Regards, Juan

author: Vladimír Lukšo
comment: Total ascend/descent is totally inaccurate, like ~20 times more. Interesting that after importing workout to Strava, it shows correct stats.

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback , our developers are aware of the issue and are currently looking into it. We apologize for any inconvenience caused by this.

Cheers,
Brian

author: Budi Mulyana Kamadjaja
comment: No more full map screen? Are u serious??? Enjoy 1 star till you give back d full map screen.

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback , we'll forward this to our developer and product teams for their attention.

Regards,
Brian

author: Krisztián Horváth
comment: miCoach HRM connection fails every time. It worked before the update.

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Hi Krisztián,

Thanks for your feedback.

Please get in touch with our support team via this form: http://undrarmr.co/2dFpRbo so we can try to help you out.

Cheers,
James

author: Sideways 101
comment: It keeps overestimating every running workout by half or more a kilometre

author: Bear and mags birds
comment: I've used this app for 4yrs & it helps me to keep track of my successes. Thanx Endomondo

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
You can manually log workouts via the History screen. Go to the top left menu -> History and press the 'Plus' symbol to add a manual entry.

Have a great day!

Cheers,
Brian

author: Vimal Prabhakaran
comment: Using this app for a long time. Very good one.

author: Ashutosh Raghuwanshi
comment: I bought it long ago. It was good at that time. Now after reinstalling on my new phone, it only keeps asking me to accept the agreement. It shows all the statistics of running but never saves it to history. What is the point if I cannot see history of my improvements. Uninstalling!

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Thanks for your feedback.

Please get in touch with our support team via this form: http://undrarmr.co/2dFpRbo so we can try to help you out.

Cheers,
James

comment: Preferred the old layout. Switching between screens wasn't difficult, now half the screen space is wasted. Also seems to track less accurately than before - wiggly lines on the map and distance over estimated. Update-ran the same route 3 times in a week, and the recorded distance ranges from 17.5k to 18.5k.  Used to be pretty consistent.  Please fix

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback , we'll forward this to our developer and product teams for their attention.

Regards,
Brian

author: A Google User
comment: From 5 stars to 3 . This was  a great app that did everything well.  But this new update is useless. I know where I am running and cycling and I concentrate on the run, not the screen.  The old UI was perfect and when it had a step counter it was better.  At least give us the choice of UI's. This really is a backward step.

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback , we'll forward this to our developer and product teams for their attention.

Regards,
Brian

author: Howard Kirby
comment: Don't like the new UI. Disappointed that the preview on the app store page was still showing the old version so had to take a gamble when updating. For me half the screen is wasted on this new one. Could you please restore the old version. Switching pages was easy. Also....where is the option for satellite view? If you are off-road somewhere then a standard map is no good to anyone. Please restore map style options.

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback , we'll forward this to our developer and product teams for their attention.

Cheers,
Brian

author: Tomasz Zarebski
comment: New update is horrible, changed rating from 5 to 1 stars. 2 buttons to start workout... Holding button to stop instead of simple click.... Did product team actually ever used new layout while jogging, what a unfriendly UX!

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback , we'll forward this to our developer and product teams for their attention.

Best regards,
Brian

author: Roko Bobić
comment: Ohhh mann. New interface on phone is unnecessary complicated. I am using endomondo for 5-6 years for running and cycling. Maybe new ui is useful for some sports that I am not practicing? Anyway I really don't like hybrid of map and workout information. If I need map, sliding to other screen was perfectly fine, but more often when I need orientation I switch to some other app with better maps(like OSM). I really miss average speed when I am running and stop button should be there(it is good idea to stop workout after holding button for couple seconds). Also I can still accidental pause workout, so it didn't solve much. Awesome UI/UX on the phone was something that used to distinguish endomondo from its  competitors, I hope you will get again on track. And maybe you should focus more on improving web interface?

author: Steve Camilleri
comment: Used to Work as expected with many options. Now it crashes at random during a workout leaving you with loads of gaps in your records. Please bring back the previous version. Unfortunately all recommended packaged solutions failed to resolve issue. All be reinstalling. Fingers crossed

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Please contact our support team directly and we'll look into the issue and any possible troubleshooting options: http://undrarmr.co/2dFpRbo

Cheers, 
Brian

author: Chris Colden
comment: Ui change he ruined the experience. I now have a map which takes up half the screen which I cannot hide. Thus makes the rest of the controls crampt on the top of the screen and virtually unusable when running.

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback , we'll forward this to our developer and product teams for their attention.

Best regards,
Brian

author: Matthew Gevergiz
comment: The updated version is not the same as the images shown and is terrible!!  The permanent map taking half the screen is absolutely useless for indoor excercises.  The cadence measure that worked perfectly well with ANT sensors was removed.  And the battery gauge showing the juice on bluetooth connected heart rate monitors was also removed.  Why strip a perfectly good app of great features like that?  It was 5 stars and now since I have to use multiple apps when exercising, it's a 1.  I also canceled my subscription.

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback , we'll forward this to our developer and product teams for their attention.

Regards,
Brian

author: Greg Ozo
comment: What have you done with our Endomondo? Looks horrible. Why can't I select Avg. Speed in the main window Only Avg. Pace. Who needs map view all the time. Why there is no option to customise!!! Give me back my money!!!

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback , we'll forward this to our developer and product teams for their attention.

Regards,
Brian

author: Wouter van den Brand
comment: I'll continue using it since it's still the best app around and I have invested quite a lot of time in it, but it just doesn't feel as easy and smooth to use as it used to. Very disappointing. You'd hope updates would be improvements.

author: Mattie Bertram
comment: I paid for this app several months ago when I started training for a half marathon and loved it. Now my half marathon is this weekend and the new update took away the feature that tells me my pace. This update is absolute garbage. The app truly downgraded and I'm sorry I wasted my money on it.

author: Vernon Yule
comment: Have been using this for quite a few years, was fantastic with good Fitbit and Strava integration and Relive support. Changes to the UI in the last update is a step backward. I rarely use the map, but did use the stats page especially when cycling.

author: Marek Mikos
comment: EDIT: After endomondo recently updated the app, HR graph is again available in app even withou coach. Have to thank them for keeping the promise and will keep recomend the app to my friends...thank you....[old comment] I have to edit my review. Since last update it does not show me my heart graph of bmp. This is very disapointing as it seems you have to pay to show you this. I have already bought this app years ago (before UA bouhgt it) and dont want to pay some monthy fees. Will have to look for something else.

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback , our developers are aware of the issue and are currently looking into it. We apologize for any inconvenience caused by this.

Cheers,
Brian

author: Taneli Tikkakoski
comment: Updates show that you dont respect user experience. Pro account should be adfree like was told when I bought it.  Now there is constant ad go premium even though i bought pro version to get rid of ads. Also new UI sucks big time.  Update: Removed last star after the reply. Upgrade to premium notice is visible 100% of time now and it is more annoying than regular ads.

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Hi Taneli, Pro users do not see external advertisements. The Premium banner is from Endomondo.

Best regards,
Brian

author: David Graham
comment: In general excellent app, map plus plenty of info which allows one to check the stats at any point in the run from the retained history. HOWEVER in the last week or so, the app stops functioning at some random point in the run,  stops mapping and measuring of distance travelled. Serious glitch which need to fix.

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Please see our newest guide on various solutions to GPS and Power saving related issues: https://support.endomondo.com/hc/en-us/articles/115003633613-Android-GPS-Troubleshooting-Guide

Best regards,
Brian

author: Steve Davis
comment: What happened? I can't see my heart rate when running a training plan. Shows me things I have no interest in. Can't figure out how to change it. All the endomondo website shows the lovely old layout where you could change things. I can't find a user guide to figure out how to change the display. Wish I hadn't subscribed for a year now. AND now that I've completed my workout I find out the Bluetooth classic heart rate monitor isn't working anymore. It connects in setup but not in workout. Not happy

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback , we'll forward this to our developer and product teams for their attention.

Regards,
Brian

author: Euan Barr
comment: 5 stars to 1 star. I've been a loyal user for the last 3 years but the update has ruined this app. The layout is now a massive backwards step and app now stops picking up my Bluetooth HR signal from my cardio strap as soon as the workout starts. Will be asking for my money back. If its not broken don't fix it...

author: Sangeet Sharma
comment: What happened to the app?? Can't use any features, takes me to updated privacy policy and terms and conditions page. Just keep on accepting and nothing else. Disappointed.

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback , our developers are aware of the issue and are currently looking into it. We apologize for any inconvenience caused by this.

Cheers,
Brian

author: Teylo Thornton
comment: Need to look around for a new workout app. The changes they have made such as now needing to  hold the stop button to end a workout are not user friendly

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback , we'll forward this to our developer and product teams for their attention.

Regards,
Brian

author: steve rambo
comment: What happened??? App is now mostly useless. No music interface anymore. Bad layout. Was 5 star, now I am switching apps to something else.

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
HI Steve, we appreciate the feedback, please note that the music option is still available under the Workout settings in the application.

Best regards,
Brian

author: Ben Wright
comment: What happened to tone only in interval training? I don't need my music to be interrupted halfway through an interval. I just need Hi med and low intensity tone. Anyway cancelled my subscription until I find this feature again.

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback , we'll forward this to our developer and product teams for their attention.

Cheers,
Brian

author: Krisztián Nagy
comment: I dont like the new layout. I cannot even define which values to see on the screen. (I wanted the avg. speed). Furthermore the summary shows stupid numbers: 180 km/h on a walk as max speed? I know there was some gps failure but i thought there was an algorithm to even out these. It also shows me that i went 11m under sea level. In Hungary there is no such place...

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback , we'll forward this to our developer and product teams for their attention.

Regards,
Brian

author: Rubaiyat Mamun
comment: Gave a five star once upon a time but it seems the developers are experimenting too much now. Even tracking a simple workout became difficult with this newest update. I completed a cycling and two walkings within last two days but still nothing showing in my history! What is happening with this app!!! Workouts are auto-pausing every now and then and I had to manually resume workouts every time. What the hell will I do?? Complete a stiff uphill walk or continue to look at my phone screen? Please developers do something or you are losing a premium  user...take it into account

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Please contact our support team directly and we'll look into the issue and any possible troubleshooting options: http://undrarmr.co/2dFpRbo

Cheers, 
Brian

author: j m.
comment: Why is this sw so flakey. It keeps crashing.  Do some users actually pay for this product?  It's too buggy for me to consider paying for it.

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Please contact our support team directly and we'll look into the issue and any possible troubleshooting options: http://undrarmr.co/2dFpRbo

Cheers, 
Brian

author: A Google User
comment: I still love this app. The new updated version has a better UI/UX imho. The only problem is that functionality is limited and some of the old working features do not work (ie. Legacy BT heart rate monitors).

author: Aukaradate Maneerojchay
comment: lose my work out history in new version today 27km. am so sorry have 1 star for app

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Please contact our support team directly and we'll look into the issue and any possible troubleshooting options: http://undrarmr.co/2dFpRbo

author: Mariusz Dullak
comment: What have just happened? No speed on the main screen. There is less items I can see on my main screen. Why would I need a map on the main screen? I understand there are people using map during training, but why do we all have to use this view now?  In Android Smartwatch settings I can not see what is set (it always says Zone 1 and Zone 2).  Horrid as I see it. Do you guys even have QA and UX departments ?

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback , we'll forward this to our developer and product teams for their attention.

Regards,
Brian

author: Mohit kumar
comment: i am using this app since last year but after this new update my gps signal indicator turns green and yellow frequently and not tracking my running accurately. i like new design but gps accuracy is the main thing. i am using endomondo since last year and doing running at same place

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
Please contact our support team directly and we'll look into the issue and any possible troubleshooting options: http://undrarmr.co/2dFpRbo

author: Antonio Stephens
comment: Why did you put this stupid map on my workout? Not everyone works out outdoors. The map is cool for my runs but not my gym time. Can I get an option to turn it off?

reply.author: Endomondo.com
reply.content:
